headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Blackstone (BX) After Strong Multi Year Share Price Gains?
summary: If you are looking at Blackstone and wondering whether the current share price still makes sense, you are not alone. Many investors are asking the same question. The stock recently closed at US$155.30, with returns of 0.8% over 7 days, a 0.5% decline over 30 days, a 2.2% decline year to date, an 8.0% decline over 1 year, and very large gains over 3 and 5 years at 99.9% and 190.7% respectively. These moves have kept Blackstone firmly in the spotlight, as long term holders compare the strong...
